TO CONG SANG    
Current address: 539 CMT8 Street, District 10, HCMC.  
Permanent address: Phan Rang – Thap Cham city, Ninh Thuan.   
      Bachelor of Accountancy  
     2011 – 2015  
University of Economics Ho Chi Minh city  
Chief Accountant Certificate                                                                                                               
2018      
Ministry of Finance  
QUALIFICATION   
     SONKIM LAND                    
                                       2019 – Now 
General Accountant  
 Supporting Chief Accountant in overseeing overall accounting function.   
 Preparing financial statements/management reports under GAAP and IFRS (for Hong Kong 
stakeholders).  
 Making periodical tax returns and payment (VAT, PIT, CIT, FCT).  
 Assisting Chief Accountant in controlling budget and preparing cash forecast.  
 Requesting and compiling funding from other departments to safeguard the company’s cash position.   
 Attending monthly BOD meetings together with Chief Accountant, drafting meeting minutes to 
emphasize areas of improvement.  
 Supervising the works of AR-AP accountants, cashiers and giving advice to ensure strict compliance 
with the law and internal procedure.  
 Coordinating with other departments: Finance, Sales & Customer Services, Project Development,… 
to collect necessary information and get tasks done smoothly.   
SCS GLOBAL CONSULTING VIETNAM  
                                                   2016 – 2018  
Senior accounting consultant  
 In charge of tax and accounting service for several companies from Japan, Singapore, Korea, 
Vietnam.  
  WORK EXPERIENCE   
 Involved directly in full accounting cycle for clients, i.e. helped set up client's accounting operation 
and procedure, prepare quarterly/yearly tax declaration/payment and financial reports.  
 Coordinated with external audit on drafting/issuing audited financial statement.  
 Assisted managers in tax due diligence, VAT refunding, tax audit assignments.  
 Liaised regularly with tax officers and other government bodies (DPI, DIT) to resolve clients' 
business issues.   
    HUDSON SHIPPING LINES, INC.    
                                                         2015 - 2016     
Operations trainee  
 Controlled daily operations of 3-5 shipping voyages at the same time.   
 Presented and explained financial and operational performance of voyages in-charge to US office 
during monthly meetings.  
 Coordinated with various stakeholders worldwide including remote colleagues, ship captains and 
crew, ship-owners, charterers.  
 IELTS 7.0 (2018)   
 Certificate for training completion on workplace leadership skills.  
(Full scholarship granted by Achieve Global, 2015)  
CERTIFICATES   
 First prize in academic English competition Amazing UEH- 2014  
 Third prize in English contest day Step Up UEH - 2014  
 First prize in cultural exchange competition Vietnam 3D hold by AIESEC - 2014   
 Prize in academic research UEH 500 - 2013  
ACHIEVEMENTS   
 English: Fluent in all 4 skills (Listening – Reading – Writing - Speaking).   
 Experience in multi-cultural work settings.  
 MS office applications: B certificate.  
 Competent in various accounting softwares (FAST, Misa, Xero, ERP)  
 Communication and presentation skills.  
  SKILLS   
 Work management skills, can work under high pressure.  
 Careful, detail-oriented, responsible.
